text: István Ervin Herman (16 October 1947 – 21 October 2021) was a Hungarian businessman and politician. He was a member of the National Assembly (MP) for Füzesabony from 2010 to 2014. He was a member of the Fidesz. Herman was born in Aldebrő, Hungary. Herman died on 21 October 2021, aged 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hungarian businesspeople Category:Hungarian politicians
title: István Herman
